org.openadaptor.core.connector
Class ThrottlingReadConnector

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.core.Component
      org.openadaptor.core.connector.ThrottlingReadConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
Administrable, IComponent, IPollingReadConnector, IReadConnector
public class ThrottlingReadConnector
extends Component
implements IPollingReadConnector

A polling read connector that calls to underlying read connector at fixed time intervals. When this connector polls it calls the following on the IReadConnector it is wrapping... IReadConnector.next(long) The throttling occurs between calls to IReadConnector.next(long). Note that the difference between this connector and LoopingPollingReadConnector and CronnablePollingReadConnector is that this connector operates between single calls to #next(long) by the underlying reader whereas the other two treat all calls #next(long) until #isDry() is true, as one read operation. This connector does not connect or disconnect the underlying reader.

Author:
Kris Lachor
See Also:
CronnablePollingReadConnector, LoopingPollingReadConnector
